Text: RE W QuestionShelley I have checked the system and find that the only changes made to your record during are as follows VP Reg Gov Affairs Co Title change to VP Gas Logistics no company change FMLA Leave no company change to present company change to E I have nothing indicating a company change for Let me know who in payroll you spoke with and maybe I can work with them to determine their conclusion Rita Original Message From Houston Rita Sent Monday March PM To Corman Shelley Subject RE W Question Shelly As soon as SAP is back up I will look to see what the changes made to your record were Im thinking your Tax company is Corp and that perhaps you are listed as deferred comp Thats just off the top of my head Again once the system is operating again I will check into this Rita Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Monday March PM To Houston Rita Subject W Question Rita I was recently quizzing payroll on why I received two Ws which sum in aggregate to my payroll stub when I thought had been employed by the same co all year Her records indicated that you had entered a change during the year Could you look into why I can listed as having worked for both Enron Operations Services Co Enron Corp in Shelley Corman x

RE W QuestionI will make the call and research Rita Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Wednesday March AM To Houston Rita Subject RE W Question Unfortunately I didnt write down the name of the person in payroll that returned my call to the main payroll number Whoever it was logged into their system and said that the record showed you making the co change Could you give payroll a call Original Message From Houston Rita Sent Wednesday March AM To Corman Shelley Subject RE W Question Importance High Shelley I have checked the system and find that the only changes made to your record during are as follows VP Reg Gov Affairs Co Title change to VP Gas Logistics no company change FMLA Leave no company change to present company change to E I have nothing indicating a company change for Let me know who in payroll you spoke with and maybe I can work with them to determine their conclusion Rita Original Message From Houston Rita Sent Monday March PM To Corman Shelley Subject RE W Question Shelly As soon as SAP is back up I will look to see what the changes made to your record were Im thinking your Tax company is Corp and that perhaps you are listed as deferred comp Thats just off the top of my head Again once the system is operating again I will check into this Rita Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Monday March PM To Houston Rita Subject W Question Rita I was recently quizzing payroll on why I received two Ws which sum in aggregate to my payroll stub when I thought had been employed by the same co all year Her records indicated that you had entered a change during the year Could you look into why I can listed as having worked for both Enron Operations Services Co Enron Corp in Shelley Corman x

FW W Question Shelley Corman Cc Fran On Monday March I received an email from Shelley Corman regarding her receipt of Ws One from Enron Corp and one from Enron Opns Svcs Co In researching this I talked with Valley Confer in payroll and what we find is that Shelleys Tax company changed on from Enron Corp to Enron Opns Svcs and on the Tax company changed back to co Currently her tax company is Enron Corp If memory serves me correctly Tax Co is for employees on deferred compensation Could this Shelleys case I am asking that you all follow up with Shelley regarding the change in Tax Companys as I have exhausted my research Rita Original Message From Houston Rita Sent Wednesday March AM To Corman Shelley Subject RE W Question I will make the call and research Rita Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Wednesday March AM To Houston Rita Subject RE W Question Unfortunately I didnt write down the name of the person in payroll that returned my call to the main payroll number Whoever it was logged into their system and said that the record showed you making the co change Could you give payroll a call Original Message From Houston Rita Sent Wednesday March AM To Corman Shelley
